caseTitle: Government of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa through District Collector/District Officer (R&E) (Now) Deputy Commissioner  Mardan and others v. Misal Khan
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Interpretation of Section 28 of Land Acquisition Act, 1894 as amended by NWFP Land Acquisition (Amendment) Ordinance, 2001.
